Edward Philippe Pierre "Ward" de Ravet (1 June 1924 â€“ 6 March 2013) was a Belgian actor. His wife was Belgian stage and television actress Fanny Winkler.
Death
Ward de Ravet, as he was universally known, died on 6 March 2013, aged 88. He had been in a nursing home in Zandhoven.
